commandsListTooltip:
This bot was made for the Hypixel Translators Community by %%q10%%. It's open source and our GitHub repository can be found [here]%%link%%.
You can help translate the bot by following the instructions in [this message]%%msgLink%%.

You can execute `+help <name of command>` to learn more about a specific command.
Here's a list of all commands:
madeBy: | Bot made with lots of care by %%q10%%

help.description: Shows you all available commands and other info about the bot.

prefix.description: Gives you the appropriate prefix for your language(s).

quote.description: Gets (or adds) a funny/weird/wise quote from the server.

mention.description: Mentions a language role with an optional message.

context.description: Gets, adds or edits context for the given string ID. `+context help` shows you information about this command.

bug.description: Opens our GitHub issues page, where you can report any bugs.

feedback.description: Sends your feedback on the bot to staff.

language.description: Changes your language, shows your current one or shows a list of available languages.
